column4: Greetings, I'm having trouble installing 9.04 server on a PowerEdge 6450 with a SCSI CD-ROM (TEAC CD-224e). The CD can boot alrighty, but the installer can't mount the CD afterwards. I've tried booting off of a USB key, to no avail (BIOS is porbably too old)
sounds like cd drive is too old too, or bad.
perhaps, dmesg is reporting a lot of CRC errors
one solution might be to use a bootfloppy.
